verses.verse: The word <WH1697> of the LORD <WH3068> came again unto me, saying <WH559>,
Son <WH1121> of man <WH120>, there were two <WH8147> women <WH802>, the daughters <WH1323> of one <WH259> mother <WH517>:

And they committed whoredoms <WH2181> in Egypt <WH4714>; they committed whoredoms <WH2181> in their youth <WH5271>: there were their breasts <WH7699> pressed <WH4600>, and there they bruised <WH6213> the teats <WH1717> of their virginity <WH1331>.

And the names <WH8034> of them were Aholah <WH170> the elder <WH1419>, and Aholibah <WH172> her sister <WH269>: and they were mine, and they bare <WH3205> sons <WH1121> and daughters <WH1323>. Thus were their names <WH8034>; Samaria <WH8111> is Aholah <WH170>, and Jerusalem <WH3389> Aholibah <WH172>.
And Aholah <WH170> played the harlot <WH2181> when she was mine <WH8478>; and she doted <WH5689> on her lovers <WH157>, on the Assyrians <WH804> her neighbours <WH7138>,
Which were clothed <WH3847> with blue <WH8504>, captains <WH6346> and rulers <WH5461>, all of them desirable <WH2531> young men <WH970>, horsemen <WH6571> riding <WH7392> upon horses <WH5483>.

Thus she committed <WH5414> her whoredoms <WH8457> with them, with all them that were the chosen <WH4005> men <WH1121> of Assyria <WH804>, and with all on whom she doted <WH5689>: with all their idols <WH1544> she defiled <WH2930> herself.

Neither left <WH5800> she her whoredoms <WH8457> brought from Egypt <WH4714>: for in her youth <WH5271> they lay <WH7901> with her, and they bruised <WH6213> the breasts <WH1717> of her virginity <WH1331>, and poured <WH8210> their whoredom <WH8457> upon her.
Wherefore I have delivered <WH5414> her into the hand <WH3027> of her lovers <WH157>, into the hand <WH3027> of the Assyrians <WH1121> <WH804>, upon whom she doted <WH5689>.

These discovered <WH1540> her nakedness <WH6172>: they took <WH3947> her sons <WH1121> and her daughters <WH1323>, and slew <WH2026> her with the sword <WH2719>: and she became famous <WH8034> among women <WH802>; for they had executed <WH6213> judgment <WH8196> upon her.

And when her sister <WH269> Aholibah <WH172> saw <WH7200> this, she was more corrupt <WH7843> in her inordinate love <WH5691> than she, and in her whoredoms <WH8457> more than her sister <WH269> in her whoredoms <WH2183>.

She doted <WH5689> upon the Assyrians <WH1121> <WH804> her neighbours <WH7138>, captains <WH6346> and rulers <WH5461> clothed <WH3847> most gorgeously <WH4358>, horsemen <WH6571> riding <WH7392> upon horses <WH5483>, all of them desirable <WH2531> young men <WH970>.
Then I saw <WH7200> that she was defiled <WH2930>, that they took both <WH8147> one <WH259> way <WH1870>,

And that she increased <WH3254> her whoredoms <WH8457>: for when she saw <WH7200> men <WH582> pourtrayed <WH2707> upon the wall <WH7023>, the images <WH6754> of the Chaldeans <WH3778> pourtrayed <WH2710> with vermilion <WH8350>,

Girded <WH2289> with girdles <WH232> upon their loins <WH4975>, exceeding <WH5628> in dyed attire <WH2871> upon their heads <WH7218>, all of them princes <WH7991> to look to <WH4758>, after the manner <WH1823> of the Babylonians <WH1121> <WH894> of Chaldea <WH3778>, the land <WH776> of their nativity <WH4138>:
And as soon as she saw <WH4758> them with her eyes <WH5869>, she doted <WH5689> upon them, and sent <WH7971> messengers <WH4397> unto them into Chaldea <WH3778>.

And the Babylonians <WH1121> <WH894> came <WH935> to her into the bed <WH4904> of love <WH1730>, and they defiled <WH2930> her with their whoredom <WH8457>, and she was polluted <WH2930> with them, and her mind <WH5315> was alienated <WH3363> from them.

So she discovered <WH1540> her whoredoms <WH8457>, and discovered <WH1540> her nakedness <WH6172>: then my mind <WH5315> was alienated <WH3363> from her, like as my mind <WH5315> was alienated <WH5361> from her sister <WH269>.

Yet she multiplied <WH7235> her whoredoms <WH8457>, in calling to remembrance <WH2142> the days <WH3117> of her youth <WH5271>, wherein she had played the harlot <WH2181> in the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714>.
For she doted <WH5689> upon their paramours <WH6370>, whose flesh <WH1320> is as the flesh <WH1320> of asses <WH2543>, and whose issue <WH2231> is like the issue <WH2231> of horses <WH5483>.
Thus thou calledst to remembrance <WH6485> the lewdness <WH2154> of thy youth <WH5271>, in bruising <WH6213> thy teats <WH1717> by the Egyptians <WH4714> for the paps <WH7699> of thy youth <WH5271>.

¶ Therefore, O Aholibah <WH172>, thus saith <WH559> the Lord <WH136> GOD <WH3069>; Behold, I will raise up <WH5782> thy lovers <WH157> against thee, from whom thy mind <WH5315> is alienated <WH5361>, and I will bring <WH935> them against thee on every side <WH5439>;

The Babylonians <WH1121> <WH894>, and all the Chaldeans <WH3778>, Pekod <WH6489>, and Shoa <WH7772>, and Koa <WH6970>, and all the Assyrians <WH1121> <WH804> with them: all of them desirable <WH2531> young men <WH970>, captains <WH6346> and rulers <WH5461>, great lords <WH7991> and renowned <WH7121>, all of them riding <WH7392> upon horses <WH5483>.

And they shall come <WH935> against thee with chariots <WH2021>, wagons <WH7393>, and wheels <WH1534>, and with an assembly <WH6951> of people <WH5971>, which shall set <WH7760> against thee buckler <WH6793> and shield <WH4043> and helmet <WH6959> round about <WH5439>: and I will set <WH5414> judgment <WH4941> before <WH6440> them, and they shall judge <WH8199> thee according to their judgments <WH4941>.

And I will set <WH5414> my jealousy <WH7068> against thee, and they shall deal <WH6213> furiously <WH2534> with thee: they shall take away <WH5493> thy nose <WH639> and thine ears <WH241>; and thy remnant <WH319> shall fall <WH5307> by the sword <WH2719>: they shall take <WH3947> thy sons <WH1121> and thy daughters <WH1323>; and thy residue <WH319> shall be devoured <WH398> by the fire <WH784>.
They shall also strip <WH6584> thee out of thy clothes <WH899>, and take away <WH3947> thy fair <WH8597> jewels <WH3627>.

Thus will I make thy lewdness <WH2154> to cease <WH7673> from thee, and thy whoredom <WH2184> brought from the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714>: so that thou shalt not lift up <WH5375> thine eyes <WH5869> unto them, nor remember <WH2142> Egypt <WH4714> any more.

For thus saith <WH559> the Lord <WH136> GOD <WH3069>; Behold, I will deliver <WH5414> thee into the hand <WH3027> of them whom thou hatest <WH8130>, into the hand <WH3027> of them from whom thy mind <WH5315> is alienated <WH5361>:

And they shall deal <WH6213> with thee hatefully <WH8135>, and shall take away <WH3947> all thy labour <WH3018>, and shall leave <WH5800> thee naked <WH5903> and bare <WH6181>: and the nakedness <WH6172> of thy whoredoms <WH2183> shall be discovered <WH1540>, both thy lewdness <WH2154> and thy whoredoms <WH8457>.
I will do <WH6213> these things unto thee, because thou hast gone a whoring <WH2181> after <WH310> the heathen <WH1471>, and because thou art polluted <WH2930> with their idols <WH1544>.
Thou hast walked <WH1980> in the way <WH1870> of thy sister <WH269>; therefore will I give <WH5414> her cup <WH3563> into thine hand <WH3027>.

Thus saith <WH559> the Lord <WH136> GOD <WH3069>; Thou shalt drink <WH8354> of thy sister's <WH269> cup <WH3563> deep <WH6013> and large <WH7342>: thou shalt be laughed to scorn <WH6712> and had in derision <WH3933>; it containeth <WH3557> much <WH4767>.

Thou shalt be filled <WH4390> with drunkenness <WH7943> and sorrow <WH3015>, with the cup <WH3563> of astonishment <WH8047> and desolation <WH8077>, with the cup <WH3563> of thy sister <WH269> Samaria <WH8111>.

Thou shalt even drink <WH8354> it and suck it out <WH4680>, and thou shalt break <WH1633> the sherds <WH2789> thereof, and pluck off <WH5423> thine own breasts <WH7699>: for I have spoken <WH1696> it, saith <WH5002> the Lord <WH136> GOD <WH3069>.

Therefore thus saith <WH559> the Lord <WH136> GOD <WH3069>; Because thou hast forgotten <WH7911> me, and cast <WH7993> me behind <WH310> thy back <WH1458>, therefore bear <WH5375> thou also thy lewdness <WH2154> and thy whoredoms <WH8457>.

¶ The LORD <WH3068> said <WH559> moreover unto me; Son <WH1121> of man <WH120>, wilt thou judge <WH8199> Aholah <WH170> and Aholibah <WH172>? yea, declare <WH5046> unto them their abominations <WH8441>;

That they have committed adultery <WH5003>, and blood <WH1818> is in their hands <WH3027>, and with their idols <WH1544> have they committed adultery <WH5003>, and have also caused their sons <WH1121>, whom they bare <WH3205> unto me, to pass for them through <WH5674> the fire, to devour <WH402> them.
Moreover this they have done <WH6213> unto me: they have defiled <WH2930> my sanctuary <WH4720> in the same day <WH3117>, and have profaned <WH2490> my sabbaths <WH7676>.

For when they had slain <WH7819> their children <WH1121> to their idols <WH1544>, then they came <WH935> the same day <WH3117> into my sanctuary <WH4720> to profane <WH2490> it; and, lo, thus have they done <WH6213> in the midst <WH8432> of mine house <WH1004>.

And furthermore <WH637>, that ye have sent <WH7971> for men <WH582> to come <WH935> from far <WH4801>, unto whom a messenger <WH4397> was sent <WH7971>; and, lo, they came <WH935>: for whom thou didst wash <WH7364> thyself, paintedst <WH3583> thy eyes <WH5869>, and deckedst <WH5710> thyself with ornaments <WH5716>,
And satest <WH3427> upon a stately <WH3520> bed <WH4296>, and a table <WH7979> prepared <WH6186> before <WH6440> it, whereupon thou hast set <WH7760> mine incense <WH7004> and mine oil <WH8081>.

And a voice <WH6963> of a multitude <WH1995> being at ease <WH7961> was with her: and with the men <WH582> of the common sort <WH7230> <WH120> were brought <WH935> Sabeans <WH5436> <WH5433> from the wilderness <WH4057>, which put <WH5414> bracelets <WH6781> upon their hands <WH3027>, and beautiful <WH8597> crowns <WH5850> upon their heads <WH7218>.
Then said <WH559> I unto her that was old <WH1087> in adulteries <WH5004>, Will they now commit <WH2181> whoredoms <WH8457> with her, and she with them?

Yet they went in <WH935> unto her, as they go in <WH935> unto a woman <WH802> that playeth the harlot <WH2181>: so went they in <WH935> unto Aholah <WH170> and unto Aholibah <WH172>, the lewd <WH2154> women <WH802>.

¶ And the righteous <WH6662> men <WH582>, they shall judge <WH8199> them after the manner <WH4941> of adulteresses <WH5003>, and after the manner <WH4941> of women that shed <WH8210> blood <WH1818>; because they are adulteresses <WH5003>, and blood <WH1818> is in their hands <WH3027>.
For thus saith <WH559> the Lord <WH136> GOD <WH3069>; I will bring up <WH5927> a company <WH6951> upon them, and will give <WH5414> them to be removed <WH2189> and spoiled <WH957>.

And the company <WH6951> shall stone <WH7275> them with stones <WH68>, and dispatch <WH1254> them with their swords <WH2719>; they shall slay <WH2026> their sons <WH1121> and their daughters <WH1323>, and burn up <WH8313> their houses <WH1004> with fire <WH784>.
Thus will I cause lewdness <WH2154> to cease <WH7673> out of the land <WH776>, that all women <WH802> may be taught <WH3256> not to do <WH6213> after your lewdness <WH2154>.

And they shall recompense <WH5414> your lewdness <WH2154> upon you, and ye shall bear <WH5375> the sins <WH2399> of your idols <WH1544>: and ye shall know <WH3045> that I am the Lord <WH136> GOD <WH3069>.
